001package net.tvburger.jdl.mlp;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Floats;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.LinesAndCircles;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.initializers.XavierInitializer;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.optimizers.NeuralNetworkOptimizers;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.activations.Activations;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Trainer;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss.Objectives;
014import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.Regimes;
015import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.ImageViewer;
016import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.listeners.EpochRmePlotter;
017
018public class MLPCirclesAndSquaresMain {
019
020    public static void main(String[] args) {
021        MultiLayerPerceptron mlp = MultiLayerPerceptron.create(Activations.sigmoid(), Activations.sigmoid(), 400, 8);
022
023        DataSet<Float> dataSet = new LinesAndCircles().load();
024        DataSet<Float> trainingSet = dataSet.subset(10, dataSet.size());
025        DataSet<Float> testSet = dataSet.subset(0, 10);
026        EpochRmePlotter epochRmePlotter = new EpochRmePlotter();
027        epochRmePlotter.display();
028        Regime regime = Regimes.epochs(100,
029                epochRmePlotter.attach("Training Set (" + trainingSet.size() + ")"),
030                epochRmePlotter.attach("Test Set (" + testSet.size() + ")", testSet)).batch();
031        Optimizer<? super MultiLayerPerceptron, Float> optimizer = NeuralNetworkOptimizers.adaGrad(0.1f);
032        Trainer<MultiLayerPerceptron, Float> trainer = Trainer.of(new XavierInitializer(), Objectives.bCE(mlp.getNumberTypeSupport()), optimizer, regime);
033        trainer.train(mlp, trainingSet);
034
035        int i = 0;
036        int correct = 0;
037        int wrong = 0;
038        for (DataSet.Sample<Float> sample : testSet) {
039            i++;
040            Array<Boolean> estimate = Floats.toBooleans(mlp.estimate(sample.features()), 0.5f);
041            Array<Boolean> target = Floats.toBooleans(sample.targetOutputs(), 0.5f);
042            if (Array.equals(estimate, target)) {
043                correct++;
044            } else {
045                String label = createLabel(i, target, estimate);
046                ImageViewer image = ImageViewer.fromPerceptronImage(label, sample);
047                image.display();
048                wrong++;
049            }
050        }
051        if (wrong == 0) {
052            DataSet.Sample<Float> sample = testSet.samples().getFirst();
053            Array<Boolean> estimate = Floats.toBooleans(mlp.estimate(sample.features()), 0.5f);
054            Array<Boolean> target = Floats.toBooleans(sample.targetOutputs(), 0.5f);
055            String label = createLabel(1, target, estimate);
056            ImageViewer image = ImageViewer.fromPerceptronImage(label, sample);
057            image.display();
058        }
059        System.out.println("Correct: " + correct + ", Wrong: " + wrong + ", Total: " + (correct + wrong));
060    }
061
062    private static String createLabel(int i, Array<Boolean> target, Array<Boolean> estimate) {
063        String label = "";
064        boolean wrong = false;
065        label += estimate.get(0) ? "Circle " : "Line ";
066        if (target.get(0) != estimate.get(0)) {
067            wrong = true;
068        }
069        label += estimate.get(1) ? "Left" : "Right";
070        if (target.get(1) != estimate.get(1)) {
071            wrong = true;
072        }
073        return i + ". " + (wrong ? "X: " : "V: ") + label;
074    }
075
076}
